description: Cows are depicted in a pasture, engaging in their natural behavior. A central figure experiences a moment of profound, absurd realization about its environment and actions. The scenario creates irony by portraying creatures defined by grazing as astonished by the presence of grass. This highlights a surreal lack of fundamental self-awareness regarding their most basic sustenance. The scene presents the commonplace act of eating grass as a shocking discovery.
caption: “Hey, wait a minute! This is grass! We’ve been eating grass!”
